categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The skirmish in the Hellhoop was a battle of the Galactic Civil War.

The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia mistakenly states that this event took place some years after the Battle of Hoth. It also mistakenly states that Wutzek (misspelled Wuzzek), killed all of the Five but Chokla and then destroyed the Hellhoop. Wutzek actually killed all members of the Five and then only destroyed their warship.
